_Nethys note: This camping activity requires that Linzi is camping with the PCs (but see [Learn from a Companion](/Actions.aspx?ID=1477))._

Linzi's enthusiasm inspires everyone around her. Checks on all other [Camping](/Traits.aspx?ID=465) activities while Linzi does so gain a +1 circumstance bonus. If Linzi is master in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12), this becomes a +2 circumstance bonus.
